name: The Curse of Yog Sothoth
description:
⚠️IMPORTANT⚠️

Actually, the game's build is kinda unplayable, we're gonna fix it in the next days...

-----

At the mercy of the ancient god, you find yourself trapped in your ship, haunted and manipulated by the Eldritch Yog Sothoth.

Manipulating time, he traps you in an interminable nightmare.

The Curse of Yog Sothoth is a double twin stick shooter with a rogue like mechanic each run.
